Key Match Events: Pakistan lost to Zimbabwe by a single run in a thrilling upset at Perth
Pakistan were in control at 88-3 in 14th over but collapsed to 129-8 at the end of their innings
Mohammad Nawaz's uppish, mistimed shot was caught, ending Pakistan's hopes of a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was arguably the biggest upset of the T20 World Cup 2022 so far
Pakistan had lost their tournament opener to India on Sunday in the final over
Others: Zimbabwe elected to bat first and scored 130 runs
Shadab Khan took 3 wickets for 23 runs, and Mohammad Wasim Jr took 4 wickets for 24 runs for Pakistan
